<noinclude>
This is the Electrochemical conversion of CO2 experiments template.
</noinclude>
<includeonly><tr>
<td>{{{experiment_type|}}}</td>
<td>{{DisplayMolecule|{{{catalyst|}}} }}</td>
<td>{{{cat conc|}}}</td>
<td>{{{cell type|}}}</td>
<td>{{DisplayMolecule|{{{solvent_A__WE|}}} }}</td>
<td>{{DisplayMolecule|{{{solvent_A__CE|}}} }}</td>
<td property="hidden">{{{include|}}}</td>

<td>{{#subobject:
 |Catalyst={{{catalyst|}}}
 |Catalyst concentration={{{cat conc|}}}
 |Catalyst fixation={{{cat fixation|}}}
 |Catalyst carrier={{{cat carrier|}}}
 |Cell type={{{cell type|}}}
 |Solvent A at={{{solvent_A__WE|}}}; WE
 |Solvent A at={{{solvent_A__CE|}}}; CE
 |Included={{{include|}}}
 |BasePageName={{BASEPAGENAME}}
}}</td></tr></includeonly>
